resources.string: Unlock additional features and become a patron to support continued development!
SD Maid has no ads and doesn\'t sell user data. Continued development is only made possible by you.
Become a patron and sponsor development! Tap the button below to activate all extra features and open my GitHub Sponsors profile.

Thank you. We made it this far only together. Development will continue of course, but you can now switch to a release track.
This is already a normal version. Just opt out of testing and you will only receive release updates in the future.

You can switch without reinstalling the app by leaving the testing program and waiting for the next release update. A normal update is possible once there is a release version newer than this pre-release.
